creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: three panels, blue, stitched together with tuck at center waist; bottom 7" overall embroidered in orange horizontal geometric designs; hem is of cording; loops, but no ties; three small partially embroidered patterns on left panel
title: Skirt
